website_summaries.verdict: A trusted brand and a versatile octane booster that also works well in small engines, but if the small bottles concern you, check out others on our list.
pros: In addition to reducing noises and improving power, this booster is made by a well-known name in the automotive industry and formulated to remove gunk in the fuel-intake system
cons: Small bottles – a fraction of the size of some competitors

customer_reviews.title: seemed to perform as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to cut down on spark knock and provide a little more power.
customer_reviews.author: sprint 69

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if any additives really do a whole heck of a lot, but dad always used them before big road trips so as do I. DEFFANTLY cheaper to buy off here than at store
customer_reviews.author: Walter J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to have when needed. Would be nice for price break with a case purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: it works , but still not that effective
customer_reviews.text: it works... been using other proper octane boosters like torco, this works for a daily use, but it is far from being a game changer
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Briceño

customer_reviews.title: I think it works...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to add a boost to my 5cylinder engine. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: J. England

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It help with the gas price to use regular gas which help give you a boost
customer_reviews.author: eagle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: UAmazon had a phenomenal deal with this stuff. I got a box of it for only $25. They ran their low price add on deal. Used in 1977 corvette
customer_reviews.author: Mike Toenies II

customer_reviews.title: not impressed. did not provide noticeable octane increase that ...
customer_reviews.text: not impressed. did not provide noticeable octane increase that I have noted from other common brands. but the labeling propaganda is impressive. used in buick lesabre.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Octane Booster
customer_reviews.text: If you add this to your gas tank, your 6-cylinder engine will feel like an 8-cylinder. If you were thinking of replacing your car because it was getting tired, you won't be think that any longer ... in facr, you.ll be looking for the car wax so you can make it look as good as it feels!
customer_reviews.author: Cajun-Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't get much for the price. Other products work better
customer_reviews.author: Chase Dahmer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but costly.
customer_reviews.text: My Acura calls for high test but being frugal I planned to use this product with regular gas. Did the math and it cost less to fill up with super than regular with booster.
customer_reviews.author: BUD

customer_reviews.title: 2 stroke and 4 stroke compatible
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Just what you need when the pumps dont have the high test.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: My SUV is a turbo four-cylinder supposed to use premium so the cost between regular and premium is a pretty good difference I’ve started using regular and putting this octane boost into my cast to save money. Just started I have to see if it works, figure it will.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal
customer_reviews.text: Product was already open due to the seal in the bottle coming loose. The box, bottle and my hands smelled like gas and less than half the contents were still in the bottle. It was unusable and the item in non-returnable.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect octane booster for a daily car.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend using STP's octane booster, i mix this with the fuel injector and carb treatment. I've noticed great results as far as MPG, and throttle response.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Power Boost for High Performance Engines!
customer_reviews.text: I tried STP Octane Booster for my high performance vehicle and I noticed an immediate power increase. It solved all the rough idling and made the change of gear changes a smooth transition. STP guarantees this product and I was instantly impressed with this product. I had 3/4 a tank of premium fuel in my car, so I added the additive to my premium fuel mix with a top off of another 3-gallons. After about a quarter of a mile, the car had (my estimate) about a 25-percent boost in raw power. I will use this additive with every tank of premium fuel from now on ... EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Book Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Use to top out at 115 now easily getting to 125 and it's still pushing after using ...
customer_reviews.text: Use to top out at 115 now easily getting to 125 and it's still pushing after using this every time I filled up for about a month
customer_reviews.author: Josh holmes

customer_reviews.title: MPG and HP boost
customer_reviews.text: MPG and HP increase. MPG increase is more noticeable and easier to measure. As soon as I stop using, MPG goes down. I prefer STP fuel system cleaner over this, but occasionally use it for the boost in HP.
customer_reviews.author: Sharoyo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for everyday cars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work, I put it in my 2008 Toyota solara and immediately noticed a lot less stick between gears. At least with my car, it revved the rps a lot faster and a lot higher then what It had before. It felt much faster with more of a jump then what my car had before. For this price it can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: product provides minimal benefits. Acceleration and responsiveness was improved slightly. i found 2 bottles to give a much improved kick to the car but nowhere close to other products which would be cheaper to buy and work noticeably better
customer_reviews.author: Dadongo

customer_reviews.title: STP Octane Booster
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product twice and for the power it did increase so did my MPG from 28 to 34...i skip it once and the power and MPG fell back to 28...i am a true beliver of this product and will use it on all my vehicles
customer_reviews.author: Lento

customer_reviews.title: Small bottles are worthless
customer_reviews.text: Buy the larger bottles. The 5.25 Fl Oz bottles have less than half the quantity of the original 12 Fl Oz bottles, and I believe they produce unnoticeable effects on the performance.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garza

product_meta.title: STP Octane Booster, Fuel Intake System Cleaner, Bottles, 5.25 Fl Oz, 78574
product_meta.description: Size:5.25 OunceSTP Octane Booster helps restore horsepower and acceleration by removing deposits and cleaning the fuel intake system. This two-in-one formula boosts octane and cleans the fuel intake system to restore lost performance. Use regularly when you fill up your tank to help reduce knocking and pinging. For over 60 years, and for more miles than anyone can count, STP has been one of the most trusted names in automotive care.
feature_bullets: This two-in-one formula boosts octane and cleans the fuel intake system
Use regularly when you fill up your tank
